name: VISHWA MANAVADHIKAR PARISHAD(WORLD HUMAN RIGHTS COUNCIL)
legal: Registered by Indian trust act 1882 (Sub Registrar Lakhimpur kheri India)
membership: Vishwa Manavadhikar Parishad(World Human Rights Council)) Registered organization under the Indian Trust Act 1882, whose registration number is 16/2015 & 67/2018, Unique ID issued by the Policy Commission of the Government of India is UP / 2018/0199150, Registration number UAN NO.UP50D0015583, AN ISO 9001:2015 Certified Organization also affiliated with World Association of NGO,USA and UNO Consultative Status (ECOSOC)&Member of QCI(QUALITY COUNCIL OFINDIA).
goal:
1. To develop social, mental, moral, character, intellectual, development of all citizens.

2. To make every effort for the development of poor children of the families of all citizens.

3. To protect the rights and interests of the general public.

4. To unite and fight against the spread of terrorism and corruption in the country.

5. To awaken the feeling of mutual love and goodwill among all in the country.

6. To make every effort for the welfare of widows, elders, orphans and destitute of the society.

7. To contact big institutions in the country and abroad for the development of the country and society.

8. To raise voice against the bribe being taken by the officers and employees of the offices.

9. To raise the voice against the violation of the rights of common people and the crime and atrocities on them.

10. Organizing national unity and communal harmony camps and inculcating a sense of mutual harmony and universal brotherhood among the people.

11. To extend all possible help to the victims.

12. To try to remove all the evils that are prevalent in the society such as atrocities on women, dowry, child marriage, indecency with women.

13. To provide free education to poor children, open schools and colleges and try to get help from the government in the field of education.

14. Make every effort to solve the problems of terrorism and corruption in the country and establish contact with the administration and administration for this task.

15. To establish behavior between police and common citizens.

16. To establish contacts at national and international level for protection of human rights.

17. Raising national level international voice against human rights violations.

18. To cooperate with the courts keeping social and public interest in mind.

19. Make every effort to provide free legal aid to the victims.

20. To raise the voice of the general public at the national and international level with the help of media workers.
euInitiatives:
1.Human dignity, freedom, democracy, equality, the rule of law and respect for human rights
2.Eradication of poverty and the protection of human rights, in particular the rights of the child
3.Human rights and fundamental freedoms, committing itself to considering economic and social rights to be as important as civil and political rights;
4. Policy Human development & Educational initiative
5.Consultation procedure
6.Consent procedure
